vision.notes: Sensory capabilities of the free-living oncomiracidium larva are unknown from this context. Adult sensory capabilities are also unknown. Given they are parasitic flatworms, vision may be limited.

chemoreception.notes: Likely used for host detection and orientation by the oncomiracidium larva and adults. Flatworms in general rely on chemical cues.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely used for orientation and attachment to the host. The haptor's function implies sensitivity to touch and pressure.
